direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   2. INT: AVL HEADQUARTERS - NIGHT SECURITY FOOTAGE of the research station named PX LABS being carried away by the magnet ship plays on the screens at AVL Headquarters. We see the back of several heads watching the footage. There's a heavy sigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three weeks and we're still no closer to cracking this? No response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right... bring him in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. EXT: SUBURBAN STREET - DAY Gru steps toward camera, holding some sort of menacing gun, which he loads and cocks. He pulls the trigger, which shoots out an inflatable unicorn balloon. Smiling, he ties it to the windowsill next to some others. EXT: GRU'S BACKYARD - DAY A banner reads: "Happy Birthday Agnes!" and a massive backyard party is in full swing. The yard is decorated with pink balloons and streamers, and a BOUNCY HOUSE shaped like a castle. AGNES and several other LITTLE GIRLS slide down a slide. They are all dressed as princesses, but Agnes is dressed as a princess riding a unicorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the best party EVER!!! Edith, dressed as a ninja, emerges from beneath a table and climbs across the monkey bars as a series of jousts, blades, and boxing gloves come up from the ground underneath her. She jumps down, narrowly avoiding a bear trap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haha!   Yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT       3. Two LITTLE GIRLS fish in a small kiddie pool. One of the girls pulls up a toy duck and then razzes the other girl, but then a LIVE PIRANHA jumps out and eats the toy duck. A BOY and a GIRL sword fight. The Boy does a bunch of fancy moves. The Girl waits for him to finish and then pounds him on the head with a club. Two kids in the background are on a see-saw made of bombs. Agnes runs into the middle of the yard and points offscreen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no!   A dragon is approaching! All of the kids turn and see KYLE dressed as a dragon. He GRUMBLES and then they SCREAM and huddle around Agnes. Then Margo enters wearing a SUIT OF ARMOR and wielding a SWORD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fear not, for here come the gallant knights to save us! She gestures to a group of minions wearing tiny suits of armor and wielding various MEDIEVAL WEAPONS. The Kids CHEER as the minions charge toward Kyle. One accidentally hits another with his sword. A fight ensues in which they use the medieval weapons on each other. One minion pounds another with a MACE. One Minion wanders off from the fight with his helmet on backwards, wildly swinging his mace. Across the yard, Gru is busy grilling burgers and talking on the phone. Not happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, no! What do you mean she's not coming?! I have a backyard full of these little girls who are counting on a visit from a fairy princess! The mace-swinging Minion walks by and accidently, repeatedly hits Gru with the mace in the shin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah!   Hurts! Ah! Stop it! Gru kicks the minion's helmet and chases him off with a spatula, sending him towards the party swinging his mace. Gru SIGHS and returns to the call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   4.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen! I don't want a refund! I want a fairy princess... please! Please, I am begging you. (Resigned) You know what? I hope that you can sleep at night, you crusher of little girls' dreams!!! Gru hits the phone with his spatula and hangs up.    Turns and sees Agnes standing there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh ooh!   When's the Fairy Princess coming? Gru stares down at Agnes' big excited eyes. He opens his mouth to tell her the truth, but can't do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any minute now! Agnes squeals with excitement and runs off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yayyy! Gru looks worried--what do I do now?    He signals two minions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stall them. EXT: BACKYARD - LATER A hand-painted piece of cardboard reading "THE MAGIC SHOW" is placed on an easel. Agnes and all of the little kids sit in a semicircle on the grass. Two minions dressed as magicians are doing a magic act with Edith as their assistant. One minion blows up a balloon and puts it in Edith's mouth. Then the other whips out a CHAINSAW and fires it up, heading toward her. Margo sees this and quickly intervenes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Whoa! Okay, okay, alright. That's enough of the magic show! The minions don't hide their disappointment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awwww.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   5. Margo suddenly looks around as if she just heard something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait, did you hear that? It sounded like the twinkling sounds of magical fairy dust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (gasps) It's the fairy princess!   She's coming! Margo gasps and points up to the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look! Edith spits out her magic balloon in horror and we follow it up to reveal-- Gru. Dressed in a PUFFY PINK DRESS, fairy wings, glittery eyelashes and tiara and magical wand. Up on top of Gru's house, the minions struggle to lower him down on a rope. Edith's balloon floats by and distracts them. They let go of the rope and Gru swings wildly, smashing into the wall of the house and crashing to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaahh! He stands up and tries to cover. Agnes SIGHS HAPPILY, in awe of the fairy princess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in falsetto) It is I, Gru...zinkerbell! The most magical fairy princess of all! And I am here to wish Princess Agnes a very happy birthday! Gru sprinkles the girls with glitter and they continue to stare, frozen. Then a LITTLE GIRL raises her hand and speaks with a lisp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How come you're tho fat? Gru grits his teeth, then forces a smile and speaks with a high-pitched, dreamy voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    6.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because my house is made of candy and sometimes I eat instead of facing my problems. The girl starts to ask another question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How come you have- Gru cuts her off with a puff of fairy dust to the face.   She COUGHS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay!   Time for cake! As the kids run to the table, Agnes approaches Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Gru-zinkerbell. You're the best fairy princess ever! Gru smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in falsetto) You are welcome, little girl. She runs off, but quickly returns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers in his ear) I know it's really you, Gru. I'm just pretending for the other kids. She runs off again to join her friends. Gru watches her go. Couldn't be happier. Then he is approached by JILLIAN, a heavily-Botoxed mom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey there, Gru, Mr. Life of the Party!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (forcing a smile) Hello, Jillian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sooooo, I'm gonna go out on a limb here, but my friend Natalie is recently single, and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   7. In the background, a homely NATALIE leans against a buffet table and seductively raises her eyebrows at Gru. The table collapses to the ground beneath her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (realizes what's going on) No, no, no, get off of the limb right now. No limb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, come on...she's a riot. She sings karaoke, she has a lot of free time, looks aren't that important to her... In the background, Natalie inadvertently walks in front of a bottle pitch game, is struck by a ball, and falls to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, Jill's, that is not happening. Seriously. I'm fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (calling after Gru) Okay, fine. Forget Natalie.        How about my cousin Linda? Gru walks off, passing by Edith and Margo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, oh! I know someone whose husband just died! SPLASH!   Suddenly Jillian is sprayed in the face with water. Reveal Gru holding a HOSE with a SPRAY NOZZLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.     I did not see you there. SPLASH!   He sprays her again.    She falls down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or there. He drops the hose and walks away, CHUCKLING softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT         8. EXT: GRU'S HOUSE - DUSK Gru takes Kyle out to the front yard. CAMERA POV A camera with nightvision is watching them. The screen analyzes Kyle and a readout comes out as "SPECIES: UNKNOWN." Kyle sniffs Gru's flowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kyle... Kyle! Then it analyzes Gru and the readout says "TARGET ACQUIRED."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ky--Kyle!   No, do not do your business on the petunias! Kyle lifts up his leg next to Gru's flowers. He picks Kyle up and places him next to his neighbor's bush.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There you go. Those are Fred's. Go crazy. Kyle does and the bush immediately withers and dies.         Gru CHUCKLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Gru? Gru turns and sees Lucy Wilde standing there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wha?   I didn't... What... Yes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (holds up her badge) Hi! Agent Lucy Wilde of the AVL. (realizes her badge is upside down) Oh. Whoops. (clears her throat, all business) Sorry, you're gonna have to come with me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, sorry, I--Freeze Ray!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      9. Gru whips out his FREEZE RAY and fires it.       A WALL OF ICE heads for Lucy. But before it gets to her, Lucy pulls out a retractable gun from her purse, which acts as a FLAMETHROWER. Melting the ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know you really should announce your weapons after you fire them, Mr. Gru. For example-- She pulls out a LIPSTICK. Fires it at Gru. The tip flies through the air and connects with his chest, latching on. ZZZZZAPPP! It tases him, which sends his body flailing in different funny poses before passing out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lipstick Taser! Oh, it works so good. EXT: STREET - LATER Lucy tries to drag Gru to her car, but he's too heavy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man.    Ugh.     Large...person. She gets an idea. Lucy gets into her car. In the background, we see Gru begin to come to, but he is struck by Lucy's car as she pulls back and is knocked out again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh...sorry! Closer now, Lucy gets out and stuffs his body into the trunk. Just then Tom and Stuart come out of Gru's garage and see their boss being loaded in. Lucy struggles to close the trunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get...in...there...you...big...man! SLAM! Lucy finally slams the trunk then quickly gets into the vehicle. Tom and Stuart exchange horrified looks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boss!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   10. They take off running after the car as it pulls away, running as fast as their tiny legs will carry them. They get right behind it and Tom LEAPS up onto the trunk. He reaches his hand out to Stuart, who is falling behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Koom ey lah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Koom ey lah! Koom ey lah! Stuart leaps for the bumper and Tom catches him by his overall straps. Tom holds on tight as Stuart dangles from the back of the car, his overall straps stretching way out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaaiiieeeaaaiiieeeaaaah! As Lucy turns a corner, he slams into some garbage cans and ends up skiing behind the car in a cardboard box. Now in the box, Stuart continues to ride behind the car, and even starts to get the hang of that, too. He waves at Tom, and Tom waves back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woooo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooooh! All is good until they go past a clothesline and a sheet gets stuck on Stuart. The sheet forms a parasail which lifts Stuart up into the air. He strikes a Superman flying pose. Then a flock of GEESE fly toward him and one actually slams into his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quack quack! It SQUAWKS at him as it flies off. Lucy spots the commotion in her side view mirror and slams on the brakes. SCREECH! Both minions fly forward-- INT: LUCY'S CAR - SAME Lucy sees this, drives forward, and opens the convertible top, causing the Minions to land right in the passenger's seat. They strike threatening karate poses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   11.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi-YAH!! Lucy tases them and they pass out.       She floors it. EXT: STREET - SAME Lucy's car continues driving until it reaches a crowded PIER. And doesn't stop. It drives right off the end of the pier. A confused fisherman leaps for his life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the--     Oh! SPLASH! INT: OCEAN - SAME Lucy's car now transforms into an UNDERWATER VEHICLE. As the minions come to, one of them tries playing with the radio until Lucy slaps his hand away. They speed through the sea and an octopus slams into her windshield. She turns on the wipers, which hits the octopus in the face until he's had enough and swims off in a cloud of ink. She HONKS her HORN as she passes through a school of fish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa... As the fish pass the Minions look ahead to see a shark heading for them with his mouth open. They SCREAM. Lucy quickly steers the car out of harm's way. They pass by several more sharks until they arrive at a GIANT SUBMARINE with the letters "AVL" on the side. A HATCH opens and Lucy's car goes inside.       The hatch closes behind her. INT: AVL SUB - SAME The water drains out from the holding dock. A buffer and hair dryer come out to dry off the car. A squeegee wipes off the windshield. Then the platform the car is on lowers down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   12. INT: AVL ROOM - DAY Lucy's car lowers into the center of the room as a large circular table assembles around it, effectively locking them in. Lucy and the Minions get out of the car. She pushes a button on her remote and Gru, with a starfish attached to his head, is ejected from the trunk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (groggily) Ugh...ooh...what...where...ah...oh, foot's asleep...ah...pins and needles...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good afternoon, Mr. Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ehhh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I apologize for our methods in getting you here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't. I'd do it again in a heartbeat. I am not gonna lie--I enjoyed that. Every second of it. Gave me a bit of a buzz, actually.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's enough, Agent Wilde.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, this is bogus! Gru peels the starfish off his head and drops it onto Tom's. Stuart LAUGHS at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know who you people think you are, but-- A WAITER comes over with tea for Silas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are the Anti-Villain League.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   13. As Silas summons a map that shows all of the AVL offices around the world, Lucy's car drops out of the way. Stuart is trapped on the lowering platform and he scrambles to get back onto stable ground. Silas continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An ultra-secret organization dedicated to fighting crime on a global scale. Rob a bank? We're not interested. Kill someone? Not our deal. But you want to melt the polar ice caps? Or vaporize Mt. Fuji? Or even steal the moon? Then we notice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First of all, you've got no proof that I did that. Second, after I did do that, I put it back!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're well aware of that, Mr. Gru. That's why we've brought you here. (beat) I am the League's director, Silas Ramsbottom. Upon hearing the name, Tom and Stuart start giggling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bottom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heeheheeeeheeehee. Silas bristles at this, and glances over at Lucy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hilarious.     Agent Wilde...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, me now...? She continues the de-briefing, turning to the screens, which show an image of the Magnet Ship stealing the lab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, recently an entire top secret lab disappeared from the Arctic Circle. Yeah, the entire lab. Just whoosh. Voom! Gone. Where did it go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    14.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't care. The screen shows FOOTAGE of a TINY LITTLE BUNNY in a scientific lab. Furry and adorable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lab was devoted to experiments involving PX-41, a transmutation serum. What is PX-41, you ask? Mmmm, it's pretty bad... Look. A LABCOAT TECHNICIAN approaches the bunny with a SYRINGE containing the purple liquid. Injects some in its butt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaah! Instantly the bunny transforms into a HIDEOUS PURPLE MONSTER BUNNY. Gru and the Minions smile, impressed. Then it goes crazy and attacks the scientist.    Gru covers his eyes and the Minions pass out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! The bunny attacks the technician, then the camera...and the film is over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm, you usually don't see that in bunnies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As you can see, in the wrong hands, the PX-41 serum could be the most devastating weapon on earth. (struggles to get through the opening in the table) Fortunately it has a very distinct chemical footprint, and using the latest chemtracking technology, we found traces of it in the Paradise Mall. On the screens we see images depicting a highly technical diagram of the shopping mall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha!   A mall?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   15.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Precisely. And we believe that one of these shop owners is a master criminal. Silas scrolls through pictures of the mall's shop owners.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's where you come in. As an ex-villain, you know how a villain thinks, how a villain acts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The plan is to set you up undercover at a shop in the mall, where hopefully you'll be able to--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, I see where this is going, with all the Mission Impossible stuff, but no. No! I am a father now. And a legitimate businessman. I am developing a line of delicious jams and jellies. Silas shoots him a look.    He CHUCKLES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jams and...jellies?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, attitude! That's right! So thanks, but no thanks. (beat) And here's a tip--instead of tasing people and kidnapping them, maybe you should just give them a call! Good day, Mr. Sheepsbutt!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ramsbottom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (chuckles) Oh, yeah, like that's any better! Gru turns and heads for the door, followed by Tom and Stuart, who continue to GIGGLE about Ramsbottom's name. EXT: OCEAN - NIGHT Gru exits the AVL headquarters, which he now sees is on a SUBMARINE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT       16. Lucy leans out the door and taps him on the shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, I probably shouldn't be saying this, but your work as a villain was kind of amazing, so if you ever want to get back to doing something awesome--give us a call. She hands Gru her BUSINESS CARD.   Gru takes it and stares at it. EXT: OCEAN - LATER Gru rows back to shore as Tom yells to him like a coxswain. Gru GRUNTS with each stroke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ("Stroke!") Mack-oh! Mack-oh!    Mack-oh! INT: GRU'S HOUSE - NIGHT Gru carries a sleeping Agnes upstairs. INT: GIRLS' BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS Gru enters to find Margo and Edith not in bed.   Margo is texting someone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers) Hey, I told you guys to get to bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So when ya goin' on your date?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember? Miss Jillian said she was arranging a date for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, she is a nutjob.    And I'm not going on any date.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    17.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why not?    Are you scared? Gru stares back at Edith.     Gets a far-away look in his eyes. EXT: PLAYGROUND - FLASHBACK - DAY We flash back to LITTLE GRU on the school playground. He stares, lovesick, at a CUTE LITTLE BLONDE GIRL, named LISA.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to her friends) Hey, did you guys see the moon landing on TV?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I can't believe it.     It's so cool...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, and you know what-- Gru approaches her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, Lisa? But she doesn't notice him.    He tries again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to her friends) I was talking to Billy the other day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is so cute. Gru clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I think he likes me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Lisa, I was wondering if you-- Gru reaches out and taps her shoulder with his pointer finger. Then one of the other little girls points to Gru's finger on Lisa's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   18.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ewww! Gru touched Lisa!         Gru touched Lisa! The other girls turn and squeal, horrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eeeeewww! A little buck-toothed red-haired girl shouts out to the entire playground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lisa's got Grooties! The playground erupts with SCREAMS and everyone turns and runs away. Little Gru is left alone.     Crushed. INT: GIRLS' BEDROOM - NIGHT Gru comes out of the flashback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scared? Of what? Women?! No, that's bonkers! I just-- I have no interest in going on a date, that's all. Case closed. I'm not scared-- of women... or dates... let's go to bed. Gru gives each girl a goodnight kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodnight, Edith. Then he goes over to Margo, who's already in bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodnight, Margo. She continues texting as he gives her a kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Well, hold the horses. Who are you texting?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one.   Just my friend Avery.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   19.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Avery... Avery? Is that a girl's name or a boy's name?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does it matter?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no, it doesn't matter... Unless it's a boy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know what makes you a boy. Gru turns to Agnes, concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...oooh...you...do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your bald head. Gru nods, relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's really smooth. Sometimes I stare at it and imagine a little chick popping out. Peep peep peep. Gru sighs and gives her a kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodnight, Agnes.   Never get older. Gru turns out the light and leaves the room. INT: LAB - DAY Gru rides the elevator tube down to his lab, passing minions in various stages of jelly making. A sign reading, JELLY TESTING AREA" has been hastily pasted over a nuclear warning sign. A SUPERVISOR MINION checks his clipboard as the MINION next to him steals a banana from his pocket. He turns, but the Minion who stole the banana has hidden it in his mouth. We see the ends of the banana pushing out his cheeks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, oh!    Me banana!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   20. The Minion with the banana in his mouth shrugs. A single apple is passed down a line of Minions in the least efficient way possible. A few Minions mash fruits in large vats ala "I Love Lucy." One wears a bunch of fruit on his head like Carmen Miranda and sings the CHIQUITA BANANA song. His supervisor comes over and tells him to get back to work. The Minion tries to get out of the vat of fruit, but slips and falls down into a large test-tube filled with mashed fruit. Then all of the mashed fruit is flushed down a large hole where it is injected into jelly jars passing by on a conveyor belt. The trapped Minion is injected into one of the jars. Gru enters the lab and greets the minions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Tim, nice haircut! He points at Tim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Donnie, hang in there, baby!    It's almost Friday. Gru high-fives Donnie as he approaches Dr. Nefario.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, how's today's batch, Dr. Nefario?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I developed a    new formula which allowed me to    get every known kind of berry into    one flavor of jelly. Gru sticks his finger in and tastes the purple goo in the jar. Makes a disgusted face, then attempts a smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (faking it) That tastes good... (gags) Love the flavor of that...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's horrible, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    21.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! No! Oh, we're making great progress! (to the Minions) Here, try some of this. He hands a jar to a minion, who tries it. He GAGS!   Another minion tastes some and scrapes it off his tongue. They smash the jar and all the minions run away, disgusted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa... okay, just because everybody hates it doesn't mean it's not good. Dr. Nefario hangs his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, Gru. There's something I've been meaning to talk to you about for some time now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?   What's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (clears his throat) I miss being evil. Sinister plots, large-scale crimes...It's what I live for! I mean, don't you think there's more to our future than jelly?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I'm also considering a line of jams...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um...the thing is, Gru... (deep breath) I've had an offer of employment elsewhere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Nefario! Come on, you're kidding, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a great opportunity for me, bigger lab, more evil, full dental... Dr. Nefario presses a button and his stuff folds itself up into a traveling suitcase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     22. Dr. Nefario hangs his head.    Gru stares back at his old friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well. Let us give you the proper send-off. (calls off screen) Minions! INT: GRU'S LAB - LATER Seven minions are lined up with seven fart guns. Dr. Nefario sits in his scooter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The highest honor awarded. To Dr. Nefario for your years of service. The twenty-one fart gun salute! FART!   FART!   FART! Dr. Nefario COUGHS.     His eyes are watering (and not only from the smell).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I counted twenty-two. Dave CHUCKLES, guilty.    Dr. Nefario fires up the scooter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Farewell, my friends. The minions CRY. Dr. Nefario pushes another button on the scooter, transforming it into flying mode. He GUNS the engine and it begins flying away. At the slowest pace possible. Everyone just stands there awkwardly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This may take a while. Go about your business. Everyone walks off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I miss you already! Gru examines Lucy's business card.     Makes a decision. EXT: GRU'S HOUSE - NIGHT The shadow of a mysterious figure approaches Gru's front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    23. EXT: GRU'S FOYER - NIGHT A Minion wears a French Maid's outfit and SINGS as he vacuums the floor. The doorbell rings. The Minion opens the door to see who it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello? A shadow falls across the terrified minion as something unseen abducts him. EXT: GRU'S FOYER - LATER The vacuum moves back and forth across the floor by itself. Another Minion walks by wearing a different Maid outfit. He doesn't see the other Minion and closes the door. Then he opens it again, cleans the doorknob, and closes it. INT: FAMILY ROOM - DAY It's morning at Gru's house. Margo and Agnes sit on the couch with a LAPTOP. Edith leans over the top of the couch, looking on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure we should be doing this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, it's for his own good. On the screen is a DATING WEBSITE (CREATE-A-DATE.NET)--the girls are creating a profile for Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, we need to choose a picture. Margo clicks through pictures of Gru.    Each one is worse than the last.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. CLICK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Scary. CLICK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    24.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weird. CLICK. The next picture is of Gru in a bathing suit.   The girls react in horror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaah!!! Margo covers Agnes's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?! Gru enters the family room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning, girls! I have an announcement to make.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, what celebrity do you look like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ummm...Bruce Willis. The girls stare at him blankly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmmm...no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Humpty Dumpty!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh, Gollum! The girls LAUGH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, what are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're signing you up for online dating!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, okay...WHAT?! No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no. Gru grabs the laptop away from the girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    25.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw come on, it's fun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And it's time for you to get out there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Stop!      No one is ever getting out there!     Ever! Gru hands a Minion the laptop, accidentally hitting him in the face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, now for the announcement:    I have accepted a new job.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa--really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I have been recruited by a top secret agency to go undercover and save the world!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna be a spy?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right, baby! Gru's back in the game! With gadgets and weapons and cool cars...the whole deal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awesome! Agnes looks up at him in awe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you really gonna save the world? Gru looks at Agnes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.   Yes I am. He coolly puts on a pair of sunglasses. We pan to Dave mimicking Gru with a pair of sunglasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mocha!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   26. And then to Kevin dressed in an Amish beard and tie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cacao! And then Stuart dressed as a little girl with pigtails.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Papadam? EXT: MALL - DAY Establishing. INT: MALL - SAME Gru comes down the escalator wearing the sunglasses, with the three disguised Minions behind him. Stuart gets his dress caught in the escalator. It comes off and he hides in a nearby potted plant. Gru glances at a store called the "EAGLE HAIR CLUB." He then arrives at a charming, pink CUPCAKE STORE. The sign reads, "BAKE MY DAY" Gru frowns and takes off his sunglasses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hm.     "Bake My Day."   Blech. INT: BAKE MY DAY - CONTINUOUS Gru unlocks the door and enters. JINGLE! BELLS on the door ring. The inside is sugary and clean and quaint. Gru takes it all in. Then turns to the minions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, here is the cupcake recipe I got off the internet. The minions excitedly grab the recipe and head for the kitchen. Gru kicks Stuart, who is still staggering around in the potted plant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And don't go nuts with the sprinkles! Gru is left alone. He looks around. Sees a BUNNY CUPCAKE in a glass cake dish. Then a SHARK CUPCAKE in the next cake dish. And in the next dish he sees Lucy's head. She makes a funny face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     27. Gru SCREAMS, which causes Lucy to SCREAM and jump up, hitting her head on one of the shelves, sending all of the CUPCAKES flying. Lucy immediately goes into action, using incredible and frankly weird-looking MARTIAL ARTS MOVES to dispatch the cupcakes as they fly toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha! Yaa!      Ho! Ooof!   Zaaa!   Ay-ay- ay-ay-ay! She successfully eliminates all of the cupcakes, then turns to Gru, out of breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoo. Wasn't expecting that. (strikes a martial arts pose) Or was I? Gru has a cupcake stuck to the top of his head, frosting side down. Lucy gestures as if he's got a little food on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh... you got... You got... a little... The cupcake slowly slides down, then falls to the floor.    It leaves a long smear on Gru's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here, I'll-- I'll get it. Gru stands frozen as she tries to clean him up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, that's just spreading...um...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, alright.    I got it.    I got it!... Stop it! Lucy backs off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh!     I'll let you get it. Gru SIGHS and wipes the frosting off his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   28.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, what you just saw there was a little something new I've been working on. It's a combination of Jujitsu, Krav Maga, Aztec warfare, and krumping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, that's weird--why are you here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On assignment from Silas.   I'm your new partner. Yay!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?! No, no "yay." Ramsbottom didn't say anything about a partner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, seems that because of your checkered past, everyone else refused to work with you. But not me. I stepped up. And I'm new, so I kind of have to do what they tell me anyway. Gru is about to respond when Dave the minion comes out the kitchen door. He carries a cupcake in the shape of a Minion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walla! Immediately Lucy moves with lightning-quick reflexes. She smashes his cupcake, flips him into the air, and pins him to the counter. Dave SCREAMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know this guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, he's one of my minions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I'm sorry. I should have known. She releases him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're free to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     29. Dave stares at Lucy. Immediately smitten. A magical glow appears around her as romantic music plays. We go into Dave's fantasy. EXT: BEACH - DAY - FANTASY Dave and Lucy run along a beach together hand in hand. EXT: FIELD - DAY - FANTASY Dave and Lucy have a romantic picnic together. They toast each other with champagne. Dave drinks from the bottle. EXT: BRIDGE - NIGHT - FANTASY Lucy and Dave sit on the railing of a moonlit footbridge. Both fire ROCKETS into the air to create fireworks and are about to kiss when--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dave... INT: BAKE MY DAY - DAY Back to reality, where Dave is staring up at Lucy, lovestruck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Earth to Dave!     You can leave now. Dave goes back into the kitchen, never taking his eyes off of Lucy. INT: MALL - DAY CLOSE ON the Giant Cupcake on top of the cupcake shop. The CHERRY on the Giant Cupcake rotates, revealing a CAMERA hidden inside. VZZZZZT! The lens zooms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now, what do we got? Who's on the list? Fire `em at me. INT: BAKE MY DAY - SAME Gru and Lucy stand next to each other under a domed lamp lowered from the ceiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   30. Inside the dome of the lamp, Gru and Lucy are uncomfortably close together looking at a video screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: First suspect...Hedda Blumentoft, proprietor of Mum's the Word Floral Shop. The camera moves over to Mum's the Word Floral Shop and HEDDA BLUMENTOFT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.    Not her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, moving on... The camera moves over to the "Stuff-A-Bear" store. CHUCK KINNEY, a small perky man, holds up an empty teddy bear skin for a little boy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chuck Kinney, owner of "Stuff-A- Bear." Kinney shoves the teddy bear's butt onto a sharp metal tube. The bear inflates until it EXPLODES into a torrent of bear skin and stuffing. The little boy CRIES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think so. DING-A-LING-A-LING! The bell rings on the cupcake shop's front door, signaling a customer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! Gru and Lucy quickly hide their equipment, look up and see EDUARDO PEREZ at the door. They try to act natural.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buenos dias, my friends! I am Eduardo Perez, owner of Salsa & Salsa Restaurant, across the mall. Now open for breakfast. And you are?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   31.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gru. And this is Lucy.    And we are closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is just gonna take un momento. I am throwing a big Cinco de Mayo party, and I am going to need two hundred of your best cupcakes decorated with the Mexican flag. It looks something like this. He rips open his shirt, revealing a TATTOO of the Mexican flag on his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you think? He flexes and makes it wave.     Gru hides his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look away! Lucy stares at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You-- Whoa... Hooo...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anyway, I have to go. It's all settled! I pick `em up next week! Have a good day. Come by if you get a chance, okay? He exits.    Gru GROANS, relieved.    Finally! Then Eduardo pops back in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And welcome to the mall family! Gru studies Eduardo's face and GASPS. He pictures Eduardo in a red luchador mask surrounded by flames. Eduardo turns and leaves. As soon as the door closes--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers) El Macho.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But it couldn't be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      32.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wha-- What? What couldn't be??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That guy looks exactly like a villain named El Macho. From about twenty years ago. EXT: DESERT - DAY - FLASHBACK Classic Spaghetti western sepia-toned shot of El Macho looking menacing. He looks like the large Hispanic man from the mall, only younger and wearing a Lucha Libre outfit and mask (a mask which looks similar to the one Gru imagined). El Macho pushes the BARKEEP out of the way and grabs a large bottle from behind the bar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was ruthless. He was dangerous. And as the name implies, very macho. El Macho pours himself a shot and then smashes the bottle over his own head. He reaches down and pulls up a rattlesnake from below the bar. He squeezes its head, squirting venom into the shot glass. He drinks it down and then eats the glass. He sticks the snake's fangs into a few dollars that he leaves on the bar, before breaking through the wall behind him, leaving an EL Macho-shaped hole. EXT: STREET - DAY - FLASHBACK El Macho head butts an armored truck and approaches the passenger side window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He had a reputation for pulling off heists using only his bare hands. When the ARMED GUARDS look over he punches through the bullet- proof glass, knocking them both out of the truck. Then he lifts the truck onto his back and runs down the street with it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, but sadly, like all the greats, El Macho was gone too soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    33. EXT: SKY - DAY - PAST A bird, flying in the air, is suddenly struck by an airplane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He died in the most macho way possible. El Macho leaps out of the plane riding a SHARK, a ton of DYNAMITE strapped to him. He plummets toward the mouth of an ACTIVE VOLCANO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Riding a shark with 250 pounds of dynamite strapped to his chest into the mouth of an active volcano. He pulls two grenades from behind his back, yanks the pins, and holds onto them as he plunges into the volcano. There is a MASSIVE EXPLOSION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was glorious. INT: BAKE MY DAY - DAY Lucy stares at Gru, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, sounds like El Macho's pretty dead...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They never found the body. Oh no. All that was ever retrieved was a pile of singed chest hair. (beat) But... that face. It has got to be El Macho. Lucy gets an excited look on her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then what do you say you and I break into his restaurant? Tonight. Gru nods at Lucy's invitation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   34.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, that's good, because I'm telling you--if anybody in this place has the PX-41 serum... Gru looks out the window and points at Eduardo riding up on the escalator, scratching his butt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...it's him. INT: GIRLS' BEDROOM - NIGHT Gru enters and pushes the girls into their beds like a tour guide anxious to finish a tour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, alright, homework done, pajamas on, teeth brushed, time for bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the big hurry?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just... I have a lot of work to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Work, what kind of work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very important business. So...hugs, kisses... (hugs and kisses them) ...good night, sleep tight, don't let the bedbugs blah-blah-blah-blah- blah-- Gru turns to leave, but Agnes is standing at the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you said you'd help me practice my part for the Mother's Day show! Gru looks down at Agnes' puppy dog eyes.    He SIGHS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine, fine... Let me hear it. Quickly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   35. INT: GRU'S FAMILY ROOM - NIGHT On Agnes.    She gives her lines.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (robotically) She kisses my boo-boos She braids my hair My mother is beyond compare We love you, mothers, everywhere! Gru frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow! That was...something else. I really liked the way you smiled at the end. Let's try this one more time, but a teensy bit less like a zombie, okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. (still monotone) She kisses my boo-boos She braids my hair--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect!   Time to go! As he heads for the door--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think I should do this. This stops Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what do you mean?    Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't even have a mom. Ouch.   But Gru tries not to let this affect him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, you don't need one to do the show. I mean, you did the Veterans Day Pageant and you haven't been in combat. Agnes looks up at Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is different.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     36.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, well, then...maybe you can just use your imagination.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean I pretend I have a mom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, right. You can do that, can't you? Agnes smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah! I do that all the time! Thanks, Gru! She gives him a kiss and runs off.   Gru watches her go, deep in thought. INT: REC ROOM - NIGHT TWO MINIONS raise their ice cream sundaes and clink them together!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! Pull back to reveal many minions singing and dancing. We move through the crowd, passing by the mace-wielding minion with his helmet still backwards and a smaller server minion with a tray of ice cream sundaes in mugs. We cut up to the rafters, where more minions are dancing and singing in formation, jumping and hopping all over the place in elaborate dance routines. Back on the floor, three arm-in-arm minions take the chorus. One of them clearly having had one too many sundaes is being held up by the other two. Another minion tries to carry empty mugs down a spiral staircase, but he's knocked off by a bunch of minions running up the other way. Several minions sit around a communal bowl of ice cream, lazily sipping at it through long straws. Gru enters and takes it all in. Other minions raid an ice cream cart, hanging from the canopy, drinking directly from the spouts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    37.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, hey, hey--   No, no, no, no! Hey, please! The Minions stop singing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kevin, Jerry, watch the girls for me, okay? (points) Dave, Stuart--come this way. With me! Come on! Dave downs a jar of maraschino cherries and sprays whip cream into his mouth before running after them, with a toothpick umbrella in his mouth for good measure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Once they are gone, the Minions go back to singing and laughing. INT: GIRLS' BEDROOM - NIGHT Margo, Edith and Agnes are fast asleep in their beds. Kevin and Jerry sing them a lullaby. Then smile and quietly close the door. INT: HALLWAY - SAME Kevin holds up a golf ball.   Jerry happily jumps up and down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, putt-putt?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! INT: LIVING ROOM - LATER Jerry puts the tee and ball in his mouth as Kevin stands on a dresser, preparing to take a swing. He asks Jerry if he's ready and Jerry gives a thumbs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Una, doo-- (laughs as he lowers the golf club to Jerry's head)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     38. CRASH! CLANG! A noise comes from the backyard.      The minions exchange looks. What was that? EXT: BACKYARD - NIGHT Kevin and Jerry step out into the yard and look around nervously, armed only with the golf club and tee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boca!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (scared) Boca! They walk over to the garbage cans. The cans begins to rattle. Kevin and Jerry SCREAM as a CAT pops up from one of the cans. The cat MEOWS. Kevin LAUGHS at him and imitates Jerry's scared face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looka too! Jerry slaps him.    Kevin slaps him back.   They start to slap fight until-- A SPOTLIGHT comes down from above, lighting up the terrified minions. Before they can scream... WOOSH! Jerry is sucked up into the air as if being abducted by aliens. Kevin grabs onto a flower, and then the cat to try and anchor himself down, but they both fly up into the air. The light goes out. A few seconds later the light comes back on and drops the cat back down. It turns off again and the Minions are gone. EXT: MALL - NIGHT The mall is dark and the parking lot is empty, except for two minions and Lucy's car. INT: MALL - SAME A lone SECURITY GUARD walks through the dark mall, listening to music on his headphones. He passes by Eduardo's Salsa & Salsa. Shines his light inside. All clear. He moves on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      39. Once the guard is gone, a floor tile is moved aside and Gru peeks out. After making sure the coast is clear, Gru calls down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers) We're stealth ninjas.    We make no sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right.   Gotcha. INT: EDUARDO'S SALSA & SALSA - LATER Lucy kicks the door open. She enters.   Gru reacts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, El Macho, you're going down. But before Gru takes a step, Lucy stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait!    Wait!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? She produces a SPRAY CAN and sprays the air in front of her. Gru frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm checking for laser beam alarm triggers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a restaurant!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You never know what kind of booby traps this guy could have set. Huh? C'mon!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are no booby traps! Gru takes a step and kicks a TRIPWIRE attached to a tiny bell. TING-A-LING! Lucy points to the bell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT       40.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha!   Booby! Lucy GASPS as a door begins to creak open.      She hides behind Gru. A tiny CHICKEN hops out.      It CLUCKS.   Lucy is confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. There's a chicken. Are you lost little guy? You must be lost!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha!   Some guard dog. Suddenly, the chicken leaps into the air and lands on Gru, pecking his bald head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaiiiigh! Gru runs in circles, trying to get the chicken off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get it off of me! Get it off of me! Get it off of me! Gru SCREAMS as the chicken goes up his shirt and bursts out of his sweater through the chest, "Alien"-style. He grabs it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got you! It pecks him on the head, escapes, and continues to attack him. Lucy thinks fast and grabs a tablecloth from a table.      She lunges and covers the chicken with the table cloth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got it!     Ha! She tightens the tablecloth around Gru's neck, trapping the chicken and Gru's head inside. A muffled scream comes from under the table cloth and Lucy realizes what she's done. Gru runs around trying to get the tablecloth off his head. Lucy does a karate flip/body slam on Gru and the chicken. She removes the table cloth. Gru's head has been replaced by the chicken!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   41. She goes to karate chop the chicken, but it flies off and she hits Gru in the face instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! The chicken regroups, CLUCKS, and attacks. Lucy acts fast and presses a button on her watch, squirting FOAM onto the chicken. FSSSSSSHT!   The foam instantly hardens into a glass ball around the chicken. Only its head sticks out. It wobbles back and forth like a Weeble. Lucy turns to Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dazed) Ugh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is wrong with that chicken? (beat) Hey, that pollo? Es loco. Gru is unimpressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (noticing Gru's wounds) No? Okay, let's go. INT: KITCHEN - CONTINUOUS Gru and Lucy step into the kitchen. Lucy pulls out a HIGH- TECH SCANNING DEVICE and aims it around the kitchen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You getting anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Not yet. But hey, maybe you can find something with these x-ray goggles. Lucy produces a pair of HIGH TECH goggles.    Gru shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (skeptically) Bah... Gru puts them on and looks around the kitchen.    We now see the room from his X-RAY POV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   42.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How're they working? Tell me, tell me! Gru turns to Lucy and sees her as a SKELETON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ahh!   Ooof!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong? Something wrong?
direction.name: direction
