INT: RESTAURANT - SAME Shannon sits at a table talking to Gru, who's offscreen.    A waiter drops off a plate of spaghetti.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have to tell you, I was so nervous about tonight. I mean there's just so many phonies out there! CUT TO Gru sitting across from her. Wearing a ridiculous WIG from Floyd. And looking extremely uncomfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I hear you. (awkwardly laughs)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, so do you work out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, obviously, you don't, but would you consider it? Huh? (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    63.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Physical fitness is very important to Shannon. As you can tell, right? Huh? Shannon drops to the floor and starts doing push-ups.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah.   I can tell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (mid-push-up) Solid. She switches to one-armed push-ups.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We are in a restaurant, you know. Gru looks even more uncomfortable. Just then Lucy (unseen by Gru) enters the restaurant.     She approaches the HOSTESS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi.   Takeout for Lucy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, just a sec. The Hostess leaves. Lucy looks around and then spots Gru. Sees him with the wig and Shannon who is now doing crunches on the floor. Lucy narrows her eyes, then has an idea. She presses a button on her watch, which transforms into a HIGH TECH EAVESDROPPING DEVICE, and puts it in her ear. Now she's able to hear Gru and Shannon talking. She watches them, intrigued. Shannon has returned to her seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your accent is so exotic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah. Well, thank you very much.      I was--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know someone who can fix that for you. And you'll be talking normal in no time. Gru is starting to sweat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hahaha. Hoooo. Is it hot in here? Oof. How's the food?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     64. He wipes his brow and accidentally shifts the wig on his head. Shannon stares at Gru's hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute. Wait a minute.      Are you wearing a wig?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (really sweating it) What? Ah! (readjusts the wig) I don't think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I knew it.     You're a phony.   I hate phonies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh. What? No.      These locks are all mine...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No they're not! You know what I'm gonna do? I'm gonna rip that thing off your head and show everyone what a bald-headed phony you are.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think so, Miss Lady. Lucy presses a button on her watch and a target sight pops out. Gru watches in horror as Shannon reaches across the table for the wig. Quickly Lucy presses another button on her watch which fires a MINI-DART GUN at Shannon. PLIP. The mini-dart goes into Shannon's butt, knocking her out instantly. And saving Gru from certain humiliation. Gru stares at the now sleeping Shannon, confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello... Hello, are you...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Gru. Gru quickly removes the wig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Lucy, how you doin'...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   65.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (noticing Shannon) Wow, looks like your date's out for the count. It's like she's been shot with a mild moose tranquilizer. Shannon MOANS like a MOOSE, then passes out again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (winks) Yeah, I'm winking `cuz that's what actually happened. AN ITALIAN WAITER approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (re: Shannon) `Scusi, whassa happenin' here?    She no like?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, she's just uh-- (makes drinking gesture) The waiter nods and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughs) Oh, oh, si, si... Lucy turns to Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shall we take her home? EXT: RESTAURANT - NIGHT Gru and Lucy carry an unconscious Shannon out of the restaurant. Her head gets stuck in the swinging doors on the way out. They try to dislodge her and accidentally end up throwing her headfirst into a lamp post. They pick her up between them, Weekend at Bernie's-style. They wave to a passing COP. The cop tips his hat. EXT: SUBURBAN STREET - LATER Gru and Lucy get in her car. But it's cramped with Shannon in there too. She doesn't really fit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     66. EXT: SUBURBAN STREET - LATER Lucy's car drives down the street. Gru and Lucy now have plenty of room in the car. We boom up to see that Shannon has been strapped to the roof like a deer. EXT: SHANNON'S HOUSE - NIGHT Gru and Lucy arrive at Shannon's house. Lucy comes to an abrupt stop and Shannon flies off the roof and slams into the car in front of them. EXT: SHANNON'S HOUSE - LATER Gru and Lucy sit on the front steps of Shannon's house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I think you did it. You just officially had the worst date ever.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh, tell me about it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry--it can only get better from here, right? But if it doesn't, you can always borrow my dart gun. I've had to use it on one or two dates myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you know, as far as dates go, I think I'm good with just the one. Gru and Lucy exchange looks.   He CHUCKLES NERVOUSLY.   Time to go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, good night, partner. She pats his shoulder and walks toward her car.   Gru gets up to walk beside her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was fun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.   Surprisingly, it was.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, and uh, just between you and me? You look much better bald.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    67. They smile at each other, and she gives him a peck on the cheek and walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you tomorrow! Gru smiles a big smile. Shannon slumps over on the porch behind him. Could he be...falling in love? INT: GRU'S BEDROOM - SAME RIIIING! Gru's ALARM CLOCK goes off. He reaches out and turns it off. Ready to greet the day. INT: SHOWER - DAY Gru happily washes in the shower, acting out a puppet show with his rubber ducky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quack!     Quack!    Quack! INT: BATHROOM - DAY Gru brushes his teeth with two toothbrushes. He jokingly arranges them in his mouth like walrus tusks, then BARKS like a seal. INT: KITCHEN - DAY HEART-SHAPED PANCAKES are served to the girls sitting at the table. Edith makes a face at getting hers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So I take it the date went well?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!   It was horrible! He laughs gleefully.    The girls exchange looks.    What? Then he skips out of the room, dancing with a minion in the kitchen. Agnes's face lights up. Yes!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    68. EXT: STREET - DAY Gru makes his way to work--on foot: --he strolls down the sidewalk. --he passes a MAILMAN and gives him a high five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: High-five! Then a POLICEMAN, with whom he exchanges mimed gunfire. Then a NUN, with whom he bumps rumps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bump it. Seeing something offscreen, Gru GASPS. --he stops traffic so a happy family of DUCKS can cross the street. --he plays ultimate frisbee with a bunch of COLLEGE KIDS, balancing the spinning disc on his pointy nose. --he joins a group of OLD LADIES doing Tai Chi. --he "air" drums with a couple of BUCKET DRUMMERS on the curb. --he picks a flower, then walks by a MAN and a WOMAN sitting alone with their backs to each other at a cafe. He quickly turns their chairs around so they find each other and hands the man the flower for the woman. They smile and Gru goes his merry way. INT: SHOPPING MALL - DAY Gru continues happily dancing through the mall on his way to the cupcake shop. He shimmies with a FAT WOMAN on the escalator, then GAPS and stops suddenly upon seeing Eagle Hair Club closed. The MUSIC abruptly ends. Gru sees Silas speaking with an AVL AGENT.    Gru approaches him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (confused) Mr. Ramsbottom?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    69.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Floyd Eaglesan! Our agents located a secret room in his shop last night, and uh, discovered this! He snaps his fingers and an AVL agent hands him a METAL CANISTER in a ziploc bag. Silas holds it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's empty, but we found traces of the PX-41 serum in it. He's our man. So somehow, in spite of your incompetence, we solved this one. TWO AVL AGENTS carry Floyd away in handcuffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was framed! You won't get away with this! Get your mitts off of me! I am a legitimate businessman! Gru turns back to Silas.    He is stunned by this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah.   Alright. So...what now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, now you're free to go back to your "business." Mmmm. Jams and jellies. And it looks like Agent Wilde will be transferring to our Australian branch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in shock) Australia...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. But thank you--for everything. And by everything of course I mean...nothing. (beat) Toodle pip and cheerio, Mr. Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    70. Silas walks away to join the AVL agents.   Gru stares blankly, sadly. And then Lucy approaches him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So...we got him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yay.  That's great. (beat) And now you're going to Australia?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, it's not definite yet. Still figuring it out. Already been working on my accent. (Australian accent) Wallaby. Diggeri-doo. Hugh Jackman. (beat) So...um. Pretty excited...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great.   Well...good luck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks. You too. (remembering) Oh. Here. I wanted to give you this. She holds out her lipstick taser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your lipstick taser?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, it's just a memento. Just, you know, from the first time we met.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.    Thank you, Lucy. Gru accepts the lipstick taser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agent Wilde!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      71. Lucy ignores this and just waits, not wanting to leave.     She and Gru stand there awkwardly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... it looks like they need you, so...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I uh, I better go.    Bye, Gru. And she leaves Gru.    He stands there.   Completely miserable. EXT: STREET - DAY Gru walks back home, completely depressed. Walks past the college kids playing frisbee.      Catches the frisbee and tosses it down the sewer. Walks past the group of bucket drummers.    As he passes he KICKS one of the buckets. Walks past the old ladies doing Tai Chi. As they balance on one leg he pushes them all and they all fall over. EXT: GRU'S HOUSE - NIGHT It's pouring rain.    Gru sits alone outside his house. Miserable. And then an UMBRELLA approaches him. It looks like it's traveling on its own. But when it gets closer it lifts up, revealing Agnes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I brought you an umbrella. Gru takes the umbrella and Agnes joins him.    They both huddle under it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you doing out here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember when you said that I liked Lucy? Well, it turns out...you're right. Agnes's face lights up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   72.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but...well, she's moving away. (sadly) I'm never going to see her again. Agnes's face falls. All her hopes and dreams shattered.     But she tries to encourage Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there anything I can do to help?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I don't--I don't think so, sweetheart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, is there anything you could do? Gru thinks. INT: GRU'S OFFICE - DAY Gru is on the PHONE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Hello, Lucy. This is Gru. I know up to this point our relationship has been strictly professional, and you're leaving for Australia and all, but..." (struggles to get it out) Okay, here is the question. "Would you like to--to go out on a date?" PULL BACK TO REVEAL Dave the minion standing across from Gru, pretending to be on a cell phone on the other end of the line. And wearing a RED-HAIRED WIG. He shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eh, no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, that's not helping. He hangs up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right.     Here we go.   For real this time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      73. He stares at Lucy's card. Then turns to the phone. It's a stand-off. He does stretches and calisthenics to psych himself up. He SIGHS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can do this. He stares down the phone again. It sits there, taunting him. We cut back and forth between Gru and the phone, until finally--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agh!    I hate you! He produces a FLAMETHROWER and burns up the phone.    Dave dives out of the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (satisfied) Ah. RIIIIIING !!!    The FIRE ALARM goes off. CHOP! Suddenly AXES chop through the wall. Several minions in FIREMEN'S GEAR enter.  Another minion imitates a siren through a bullhorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beedo!    Beedo! Beedo! Beedo! One continues chopping everything in sight with his axe, then chops his way right through the wall of the house and falls outside. Another minion brings in a MASSIVE HOSE, turns it on, and goes flying around the room as it whips around like a snake. Dave tests out a fire extinguisher.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beedo!    Beedo! Beedo! Beedo! Gru takes away the bullhorn from the Siren minion.    But he keeps on making the noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beedo!    Beedo! Beedo! Dave fires the extinguisher at the Siren minion. He makes the noise again and Dave sprays him with the fire extinguisher, sending him flying offscreen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     74. INT: MINION BEACH HABITAT - DAY The minions enjoy another day at the beach. Kevin the Golf minion drifts out in the water on an inner tube. He fixes his coconut bra, then unpeels a banana and eats it. INT: CONTROL ROOOM - SAME A hand pulls a lever in a control room. INT: MINION BEACH HABITAT - SAME Suddenly a WHIRLPOOL appears in the water right next to him. He gets sucked into it. Kevin is pulled down to the bottom of the habitat and into a TUBE. INT: LAB - SAME Kevin pops out of the tube and lands in a waiting metallic chair. His hat follows him down the tube and lands on his head. CLICK! A metal strap fastens around his waist.    He shrugs and continues to eat the banana.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kevin? Kevin looks over and sees the French Maid Minion strapped into a chair nearby. He has a banana too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tom? They raise their bananas in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bello!   Compai! And then a GIANT DEVICE appears, looking like a huge, scary HYPODERMIC NEEDLE filled with purple liquid. The needle comes toward the French Maid Minion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the needle) Compai! The needle is injected into him and administers the serum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT         75. The French Maid Minion starts to shake.    Contorts.   Then MORPHS into a PURPLE MINION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blaaah! Kevin points and LAUGHS at him. He doesn't see the needle come down behind him. It injects him with the serum as well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh... EXT: EDUARDO'S HOUSE - DAY Gru's vehicle makes its way up the winding road to Eduardo's house. INT: GRU'S VEHICLE - SAME Gru drives the vehicle, looking deeply depressed. The girls sit in the back, dressed up for the Cinco de Mayo party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cinco de May-yay-yo! Cinco de May- yay-yo! Cinco de May-yay-yo! Gru's expression doesn't change.   They pull up to the front gate. EXT: EDUARDO'S HOUSE GATE - SAME Gru's vehicle pulls up in front of the open gate in front of Eduardo's house. His car almost knocks a bunch of parked cars off the cliff. The grounds are set up for the most elaborate and fun Cinco de Mayo party of all time. Sumptuous spreads of MEXICAN FOOD everywhere. LANTERNS hanging from trees. PEOPLE having a great time. Gru and the girls enter the compound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa!   This place is awesome!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Let's party. Ah? But first let's go over the rules. Because what is fun without the rules? On Agnes with her mouth and arms full of churros.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   76.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agnes, easy on the churros. On Edith, swinging her ninja sword.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edith, try not to kill anyone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hai!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Margo-- As Gru turns to Margo he sees that she is holding hands with Antonio, face-to-face, almost close enough to kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Mr. Gru. Gru furrows his brow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aghhh!    Okay... He grabs Antonio and drags him far away from Margo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gru!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There must be the standard six feet of space between you and boys. (re: Antonio) Especially this boy. Gru turns and sees that Antonio is back next to Margo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughs) You are a funny man. There are no rules, Senor! It's Cinco De Mayo! (to girls) Come on! They're starting the dance! He grabs Margo's hand and takes off.    Edith and Agnes follow. Agnes explodes with delight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (rolling her r like crazy) Arrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrriba! Gru watches them go.    Frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT       77. EXT: EDUARDO'S HOUSE - LATER Gru, sneaking through the party, spots Antonio and Margo dancing. Gru sneaks up on Antonio, using the flashing strobe lights to cover his approach. Suddenly Antonio is gone and Gru is the one dancing with Margo, who has her back to him and is oblivious to what's going on. Antonio reappears and kicks Gru in the crotch from behind. He dances once again with Margo while Gru hunches over in pain. Gru then gets the upper hand and starts choking Antonio and shaking him. Margo turns around and sees this. Gru and Antonio see they are being watched by Margo and start casually dancing next to each other as if nothing is wrong. As the song ends, Margo takes Antonio's hand and pulls him away from Gru off the dance floor. Gru is defeated and all alone. INT: EDUARDO'S HOUSE - LATER Gru sits by himself in the corner, sulking and staring at Lucy's lipstick taser. A WAITER walks by and places a tortilla chip sombrero on his head with the rim filled with guacamole. He breaks off a piece, dips it, and eats it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So glad you could make it, mi compadre. Gru looks up and sees Eduardo standing there.   Gru quickly hides the taser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (sensing something's wrong) Hey, what's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, nothing. Nothing is wrong. I'm just chilling with the guac...from my chip hat. Gru takes another scoop of guacamole, smiles, and gives a thumbs up. A glob of guacamole falls from the sombrero. Eduardo puts his arm around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   78.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gru, please. I know that look all too well. It is the look of a broken heart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Believe me, my friend, I too have spent many nights trying to drown my sorrows in guacamole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. But we are survivors. There's much more to us than meets the eye. Enjoy the party. Eduardo gives Gru a meaningful look. And then walks away. Gru watches him go. Deep in thought. Gru notices Eduardo suspiciously sneak away from the party and head into the house. Gru gets up from the table and follows Eduardo. As he walks through the party, several partygoers break tortilla pieces off his sombrero to eat. INT: EDUARDO HOUSE - CONTINUOUS Eduardo enters a dimly-lit room. Gru sneaks behind and peers through a crack in the door. INT: SECRET MAYAN ROOM - CONTINUOUS Eduardo stands in the center of a secret room, which is lined with Mayan-style totem poles. He dances on the tile floor, which lights up and plays "La Cucaracha" with each strategic step. The musical pattern is a code which opens a secret passageway through the largest totem's mouth. Eduardo enters and the mouth closes behind him. Gru tentatively enters the room. He pauses at the tile floor. He tries to replicate Eduardo's "La Cucaracha" code, but a glob of guacamole from his sombrero falls to the floor and hits the wrong tile. This activates a booby-trapped totem pole, which halves Gru's sombrero with a spear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   79.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the--oh! Gru observes the destroyed sombrero in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh. Gru attempts the code again, but missteps.    An axe from the wall swings at him and misses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooh! Gru missteps again and one of the totems lights up and spits fire at him, burning his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dazed) Aaaahhh... He missteps again and a club whacks him over the head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh! One of the totems shoots darts at him, piercing his nose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in pain) Aaaahhh! Gru falls to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oooohhh. His head hits the correct tile, and the Mayan passageway opens. Gru walks to the door, pointing at the totems and gloating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aha!    Ha ha ha-- The passageway doors slam on his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in pain) Oh! He pulls his crushed arm through the doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ouch!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: "IN THE SKY, HE IS THE ONE MAN EVERYONE CAN TRUST"

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      80. EXT: SKY - DAY A 747 jets through the sky. INT: AIRPLANE - SAME Lucy sits alone and stares out the window.    Depressed.   She SIGHS. She grabs an in flight magazine and opens it up to an ad for wristwatches. It reads; "IN THE SKY, HE IS THE ONE MAN EVERYONE CAN TRUST" and shows a picture of Gru giving the thumbs up in a cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say what? Lucy reacts, shakes her head, and now the picture is just a regular airline pilot in the cockpit. Lucy turns the page. It's another ad, saying simply "Gru Now!" and showing a picture of a muscular Gru diving from a waterfall. She GASPS and slams the magazine shut, then slowly reopens it to find the picture is really just a random muscular guy diving. It says "GO NOW - TO HAWAII!"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you like some peanuts or pretzels? Lucy looks up from her magazine to see the flight attendant, who looks like Gru. She REACTS. Then looks across the aisle and sees a lady that looks and sounds like Gru, talking to another man who looks like Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha ha ha ha ha! That's a good joke. Then Lucy looks behind her and sees the young mother looks like Gru. The baby turns around and also looks like Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just did a boom boom. The flight attendant tries to get Lucy's attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really need you to make a choice, hon. Close on Lucy as she has a moment of epiphany.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    81.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I choose Gru. (to everyone)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Lucy runs to the exit door and flings it open.   WOOSH!   Air rushes throughout the cabin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Gru stewardess! The flight attendant stands up, recovering from her twirl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome! The other passengers wave as the plane's oxygen masks fall from each overhead console. And with that, Lucy jumps from the plane, holding her purse. EXT: SKY - DAY As Lucy falls from the sky she presses a button on her purse and it transforms into a hanglider. She flies off with purpose. INT: TUNNEL - DAY Elevator doors open revealing EL MACHO'S UNDERGROUND LAIR. Gru stands in the doorway, pulling the dart out of his nose. The lair is a massive villainous complex that looks a lot like hell. Gru takes the place in. It's awesome and terrifying. The magnet ship is there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have not lost your touch, my friend. Gru turns around and sees Eduardo dressed in El Macho's old wrestling outfit, like we saw in the flashback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ha ha!    I knew it!   You are El Macho!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's right!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody believed me! Ho ho!     But I knew you weren't dead!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    82.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (laughing) Of course not. I merely faked my death, ha, ha! (beat) But now it's time for me to make a spectacular return to evil! Doctor, I think it's time we showed Gru what we're up to here. Standing in the middle of the lair's walkway is the one, the only...Dr. Nefario.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Nefario?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice to see you, Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whaaat? This-- So, this is your new job opportunity?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely. You're gonna like this. Dr. Nefario pulls a lever. A platform rises with the Purple Minion version of Kevin strapped to a chair on it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry--I had to borrow some of your minions, but it was for a worthy cause.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh!   Kevin? Agh!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, he's not Kevin anymore. Now he is an indestructible, mindless killing machine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just watch this! He then presses a BUTTON. --a machine gun lowers and the purple minion's RIDDLED with BULLETS, but unhurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     83. --a FLAMETHROWER shoots fire at the purple minion, but he's completely unharmed. --an axe is swung at him, but he just eats it. --an atom bomb falls on him, but he just swallows it and it explodes harmlessly in his belly. --a POLICE CAR is dropped onto him, and he devours it whole. Gru stares, stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And here's the best part! I've got an ARMY OF THEM! The lights come on above El Macho, revealing hundreds of caged PURPLE MINIONS. Gru can't believe his eyes.    El Macho LAUGHS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Soon I will unleash them on the world--and if anyone, anyone, tries to stop them...YEOW! Their city gets eaten! (beat) We can do it together!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Together?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Together! I have admired your work for years, amigo. Stealing the moon?! Are you kidding?! We would be unstoppable! Men like you, men like me, we should be ruling the world! (excitedly) So, are you in? Dr. Nefario pops a celebratory noisemaker in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Woo-hoo! El Macho eagerly awaits Gru's reply.   Gru just stares at him. How does he get out of this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh...yeah...probably... El Macho is taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   84.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Probably? Gru realizes he's in danger and quickly tries to backpedal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean, yes! Yes. Of course, yes, I just have a lot going on right now...I just need to get some things off my plate before we start taking over the world, that's all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: `Scuse me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No--no, forget it! One hundred percent! I am in! (pretending to hear something) I think--what is--do you hear that-- I do. That's Agnes calling me from on the surf-- Gru steps into the elevator and the door shuts. Then opens. He's frantically trying to press the button that will return him to the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Totally in! The doors close and Gru is gone.       El Macho stares, deep in thought. Clearly suspicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what? I am not so convinced that he is in. El Macho presses a button that releases the Purple Minion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blah! EXT: EL MACHO'S HOUSE - SAME Edith knocks a pinata down with a BAT, then beats the crap out of it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edith!   Agnes!      Come on! SMACK!   Edith accidentally hits Gru in the face with the bat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   85.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooof! Edith takes off her blindfold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need to go home now!    Where's Margo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I didn't get a turn! EXT: OTHER SIDE OF EL MACHO'S HOUSE - DAY Margo sits at a table alone and depressed, wearing the chip hat. She looks like she's been crying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Margo! Gru approaches her with the other girls in tow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, we're leav--hey, what's wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hate boys. Gru turns and sees Antonio dancing with a PRETTY GIRL.   Gru frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes...they stink.   Sorry, honey, we've got to go. He takes her hand and leads her offscreen before popping back into frame and firing the freeze ray at Antonio. We see he is now frozen in a block of ice. EXT: EL MACHO'S DRIVEWAY - DAY SCREEECH! Gru's car pulls out of the driveway and speeds down the mountain, just as Lucy's hang glider lands at Eduardo's.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: OTHER SIDE OF EL MACHO'S HOUSE

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT       86. EXT: EDUARDO'S HOUSE - DAY Lucy looks around, but doesn't see Gru.   She maneuvers her way through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oops, sorry! She makes it through, but still no sign of Gru. Suddenly Pollito appears and exchanges looks with Lucy. He SCREECHES and flies towards her. She strikes a martial arts pose ready to defend herself. As she does, her purse falls to the ground. The attack never comes and she looks down to see Pollito pecking at her purse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pollito!   What's the matter? El Macho appears and picks up the chicken, petting it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hey!   Eduardo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucia! I apologize. Pollito, he's usually not like this. The same thing happened the other day with... with Gru and... El Macho drops off, deep in thought.   Connecting the dots. Lucy is oblivious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, speaking of Gru...uh, have you seen him? I really need to talk to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I think he's somewhere around here. You two are close, no?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, I don't know. I mean close... I wouldn't say we were close. Why, did he say we were close? Did he say that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      87.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's more what he didn't say. For instance, he never mentioned...that you were both working for the Anti- Villain League!!! Suddenly El Macho turns Pollito around revealing that he has her AVL credentials in his beak. El Macho grabs Lucy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (threateningly) You're coming with me. He leads her away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey! We see Dr. Nefario watching this, in shock.      He's holding a drink and a Mexican flag cupcake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crikey. EXT: GRU'S HOUSE - DAY The vehicle pulls into the driveway. INT: GRU'S HOUSE - CONTINUOUS Gru walks the girls into the family room. Two minions sit in front of the big screen TV playing a video game.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So Eduardo's actually El Macho? Cool!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it is not cool. Plus, I pretty much knew it was him all along, so if anyone's cool, it's me. The BIGSCREEN TV BEEPS. Gru and the others turn to look. It's Dr. Nefario. He's at El Macho's, whispering and looking anxiously around him from under a table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispering) Gru!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Dr. Nefario...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    88.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (hurriedly) El Macho's on to you. He knows you're working for the AVL. And he's got your partner! Gru is confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucy? Wha--that's impossible! She's on her way to Australia...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nefario! Dr. Nefario looks nervously offscreen.    El Macho's coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, gotta go! Nefario disconnects the camera.   The screen goes blank. Agnes GASPS and turns to Gru.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's got Lucy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (determined) Not for long. Gru begins to walk out of the room.    He turns to the minions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. (beat) We're getting her out of there. Gru marches out of the room, fire in his eyes.    A man on a mission. To save the woman he loves. The minions are visibly disappointed to leave their video game. One of them clutches the controller in his hand and continues to play until the moment he exits the frame. INT: GRU'S GARAGE - DAY Gru gets on his motorcycle. It's the GRUCYCLE, a Gru-style motorcycle, like Arnold in Terminator 2.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    89. EXT: GRU'S HOUSE - DAY A playhouse in Gru's front yard drops away, revealing a hatch in the ground. Out drives Gru. Two minions sit behind him holding on. He speeds down the road.    Ready to kick some butt. EXT: EL MACHO'S COMPOUND - DAY The yard is now filled with ROCKET SHIPS. From behind, we watch El Macho emerge from his home to survey the troops. Some minions file into the rocket ships.    El Macho watches them and LAUGHS maniacally. EXT: GRU'S HOUSE - DAY EVIL MINION POV: The evil minion Kevin runs down the street, nearing Gru's house. He is scared by his own reflection in a shiny parked car. He spots a tricycle and eats it. Then Kyle spots him and GROWLS. Kyle runs off and evil minion Kevin gives chase.   He stops when he sees the front door. INT: GRU'S HOUSE - DAY Margo and Agnes sit on the floor playing a princess board game. Next to Agnes is her unicorn. They hear a SCRATCHING SOUND outside the window.   Agnes looks scared.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that? Margo stands up. Makes her way toward the window, which is covered with drapes. Then reaches a nervous hand and pulls back the drapes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't see anything. Suddenly, evil minion Kevin appears at the window, looking really scary! Margo SCREAMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   90. SMASH! Evil minion Kevin crashes through the window and lands in the family room surrounded by shattered glass and tangled up in the curtain. He turns to the girls, who slowly back away. He looks at Agnes and ROARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run! Margo grabs Agnes and they run out of the room, accidentally dropping the stuffed unicorn behind. Agnes stops and runs back for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My unicorn!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Agnes, no! Agnes stops and sees evil minion Kevin already has it in his mouth. Agnes screams a crazy HIGH-PITCHED SCREAM. It SHATTERS all the glass in the room, including the glass in evil minion Kevin's goggles. He spits out the unicorn. He is slowed him down for a bit, so Agnes safely grabs the unicorn, and Margo grabs Agnes's hand. They run for the elevator to the lower level, with the purple minion hot on their tails.   The elevator drops just in time. Evil minion Kevin slams into the glass door. INT: GRU'S LAB - SAME Margo and Agnes run into the lab to find half a dozen minions milling about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon!   Hurry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! Edith plays ping-pong with the minions using nun-chucks like Bruce Lee. Margo shuts the big iron door. Edith and the minions stare back at Margo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the matter? CRASH! The purple minion has eaten its way through the ceiling!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   91.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whoa! It drops down into the lab and lands on a dazed yellow minion. The girls SCREAM as it jumps up and dashes towards them. Evil minion Kevin stomps toward the girls.    They are backed into a corner. It's all over. Then suddenly a HYPODERMIC NEEDLE enters frame and injects evil minion Kevin. He falls over, writhing on the floor. Then he sits up and-- Has turned back into a YELLOW MINION.    It's Kevin!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooh-la-la!     Pilatos?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kevin! The other minions dog pile on him with friendly hugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Nefario! You're back! Reveal Dr. Nefario holding the needle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the flesh. Nefario produces a VIAL filled with YELLOW LIQUID.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behold, the antidote! He walks over to a vat of the jelly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on. Let's finally put this horrible jelly to some good use. He pours the antidote into the vat. EXT: EL MACHO'S HOUSE - LATER Gru makes his way up the road leading to El Macho's house. He is wearing handcuffs, and being led at spear-point by Dave and Stuart, who have been painted purple to look like Evil minions. But they are goofing around and giggling. And they still have a few yellow spots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   92.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, guys.     Come on!   Stay focused here! The minions somber up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay. Gru covers a smeared yellow spot with purple paint. They approach the front gate, which is closed. Dave boosts himself onto a stray box and speaks gibberish into the intercom. He hears Evil Minion gibberish in response. He responds back in Evil Minion gibberish. The intercom buzzes and the gate begins to open. The gate opens and there are DOZENS of PURPLE MINIONS milling about. They eye Gru and his captors suspiciously. Dave and Stuart poke Gru with a spear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (attempting to act) Curses. Foiled again. These guys captured me. The Evil Minions CHEER at seeing this. Gru, Dave and Stuart have to walk all the way to the house surrounded on all sides by evil purple minions. The painted yellow minions are very nervous. The purple minions eye them as they pass. They GROWL and the yellow minions attempt to GROWL back. It's extremely intense, but it looks like they're going to make it. Then one of the evil minions makes a slobbery raspberry at one of the painted ones. They get into a raspberry fight until the painted minion is grossed out and tries to rub the slobber off him. It rubs off the purple paint. One of the evil purple minions points and SCREAMS. They're exposed! All of the purple minions run towards Gru, Dave and Stuart. Teeth bared. Ready to chomp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run! They take off running.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      93. EXT: EL MACHO'S BACKYARD - CONTINUOUS Gru and the yellow minions burst into El Macho's backyard. The Evil Minions give chase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Up that tree! Hurry, hurry! They climb a tree up to the roof of the house, only to be pursued by more minions up there. And the Evil Minions have devoured the tree so they can't go back that way either. With no escape, Gru and the minions run up a tower until they reach the top--a dead end. Here come the purple minions. They're trapped. Gru kicks them away and the yellow minions try to fight off the purple ones. But they are clearly doomed. And then Gru's ship appears hovering above them! Modified as a jelly-dispensing weapon and with Dr. Nefario at the controls! The minions hang on the sides holding JELLY BLASTERS. The ship opens fire on the evil minions, transforming them. POP! POP! POP! POP! One by one they transform back into yellow minions. One of the Minions wipes the horrible tasting jelly off his tongue. Dr. Nefario sticks his head out the side of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello, Gru!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, hey!    Nice work, Dr. Nefario! Gru leaps onto the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I put an antidote in the jelly. (beat) I mean, I'm happy to create an evil army to destroy the world, but nobody messes with my family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Doctor!   Now let's go get the-- Gru looks over to see Margo, Edith and Agnes onboard the ship, holding jelly blasters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT   94.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi! Gru is flabbergasted.    He turns to Nefario.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You brought the girls?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes! (beat) Oh.     Was that wrong? Gru's ship flies toward El Macho, blasting purple minions all along the way. From behind a large jelly gun Edith unloads round after round.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wooooo!    Yeeeaaahhh! El Macho witnesses his evil minions being converted back to regular ones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no! What's happening to my minions? (beat) Gru? Gru turns to Nefario and the girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You guys take care of the rest of the minions. (beat) I'm going to find Lucy. Gru leaps out of the ship down to the roof El Macho is on. He has two big jelly weapons in his hands. Meanwhile the ship flies off with its jelly blasters firing, and comes to land on the ground below. The minions and the girls start jumping from the ship.    Agnes takes aim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eat jelly, you purple freaks! Waaaaah!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     95. Agnes' gun is a little too big for her and the kick sends her a bit out of control. But she still manages to hit a number of Evil Minions. The tide is turning. Meanwhile, Gru has gone ballistic on the evil minions.   BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! BLAM! He takes the remaining few out. El Macho kicks an evil minion at Gru, but he manages to hit it with jelly and transform it back to yellow. Gru holds his gun up to El Macho and gives him a threatening look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's over, El Macho.   Now where is Lucy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (chuckles) Let me show you. He turns to a computer and pushes a button. A fountain stops spewing water and underneath it STEEL DOORS open from the ground. And out of them rises a ROCKET. Strapped to it is Lucy. Tied to a SHARK with TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY POUNDS OF DYNAMITE strapped to her. Gru is horrified.   He GASPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hey Gru! Turns out you were right about the whole El Macho thing, huh? (unconvincingly) Yay! El Macho calls to Gru, brandishing a remote.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One push of this button and I send that rocket straight into the same volcano where I faked my death. Only this time--it's for real!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (horrified) No! Dave swoops in on a rope and grabs the remote, Tarzan- style...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tally ho!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: TWO HUNDRED AND FIFTY POUNDS OF DYNAMITE

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    96. But unfortunately he smacks a roof support and drops the remote. It bonks a bunch of minions on the head and lands on the ground. El Macho stares down Gru.   Fire in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We could've ruled the world together, Gru. But now--you're gonna die. He pulls out a vial of PX-41 and drinks it. Gru GASPS. El Macho transforms into a giant, purple, furry creature. He ROARS. Gru pulls the trigger on his jelly gun, but he is out of ammunition. He then pulls out the FREEZE RAY and fires, encasing El Macho's fists in blocks of ice. El Macho GROWLS and slams his fists to the ground, shattering the ice and knocking Gru off the platform and onto a scaffolding. Gru SCREAMS. The scaffolding tips over. El Macho grabs the scaffolding and holds it above his head, ready to crush Gru. Suddenly Gru pulls out Lucy's lipstick taser and fires it at Purple El Macho! The jolt of electricity has him shaking and dancing and ultimately sizzling and smoking, until he finally collapses on the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lipstick taser! Lucy smiles at this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw...he copied me. Gru runs off to save her.   The minions surround El Macho, cocking their jelly guns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (dazed) I am not afraid of your jelly guns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, this ain't a jelly gun, sunshine. Dr. Nefario fires the Fart Gun directly into El Macho's face, causing him to pass out. The minions CHEER, firing their jelly guns into the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT     97. One of the minions stands on top of El Macho and poses for a big game hunter-style photo. Dr. Nefario smiles for the camera as well. Gru runs toward the rocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry about me, Gru! I'll be fine. I have survived lots worse than this. (beat) Okay, that's not entirely true. I'm actually kind of freaking out up here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry--I will get you out of this! Gru attempts to untie Lucy. And then sees Pollito has walked over to the remote. Gru and Lucy GASP. The chicken looks at Gru and Lucy, then pecks the button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really hate that chicken. The rocket blasts off into the air. The Minions and Girls watch in horror as Gru and Lucy fly off on the rocket. EXT: SKY - CONTINUOUS Gru uses his knife to cut Lucy's ropes. They SCREAM as the shark gets loose and falls down to a SUSHI BAR below where all of the CUSTOMERS and SUSHI CHEF CHEER. Meanwhile, on the rocket Gru rips a panel off the side, revealing a mess of WIRES inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is there a red one?   It's usually the red one. Gru starts to pull out wires left and right.   To no avail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gru, anytime now! Gru GASPS, realizing they are approaching the VOLCANO. Time is running out. Death is imminent. He looks Lucy in the eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT    98.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen, Lucy--we may not get out of this alive, so I need to ask you a question.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, better make it quick!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'd asked you out on a date, what would you have said?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding me?!   Yes! Gru smiles. Then realizes that the rocket is still careening toward the volcano. He grabs Lucy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !!! Gru and Lucy grab hands and leap off the rocket. The rocket plunges into the volcano. Gru and Lucy plummet through the air. KA-BLAAAAM!!! The volcano explodes in a massive tempest of fire and smoke and lava. The impact of the blast hits Gru and Lucy and sends them flying. SPLASH!   They hit the water. BAM!   BOOM!   The volcano continues exploding. SPLASH! Gru emerges, soaking and out of breath.     Fire and lava flying all around him. He can't find Lucy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh!  Lucy! (looks around, panicking) Lucy! Where are you?! After a few moments, Lucy also emerges.    Gru is incredibly relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Lucy!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gru!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & KEN DRAFT      99. Lucy smiles and hugs Gru. They both go underwater.       Then come back up. Sputtering. And in love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry...I guess you kind of need your arms to tread water, huh? The Minions appear in the rowboat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ("Stroke!") Mack-oh! Mack-oh!      Mack-oh! But they pass right by them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll be back... TITLE CARD: 147 DATES LATER... Romantic music plays under the title card. EXT: HILLSIDE - DAY Four minions, dressed in matching suits, begin to sing a All- 4-One's "I Swear," pronounced "Underwear" in Minionese. We are at Gru and Lucy's wedding reception. We PULL BACK to the WEDDING CAKE, and then to Gru and Lucy dancing. As they dance we see all of the wedding guests watching: Gru's Mom, Dr. Nefario, Silas, Jillian, Shannon, Natalie, etc. Gru dips Lucy and they attempt their kiss, but their noses keep bumping. They finally manage to kiss and the crowd CHEERS. We see the three girls watching in their beautiful bridesmaid dresses. Agnes can barely contain her glee. PAN OVER TO Edith, who makes a face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I be the first to say--ewwww! The minions finish the song. The girls sit at their table.    Agnes clearly has something on her mind. She SIGHS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. She stands up on the table.
direction.name: direction
